snippet: SIEGEL--Jerome. Columbia University Medical Center celebrates the life and mourns the passing of Jerome Siegel, whose support of our Pancreas Center was invaluable. In particular, his establishment of the Ruth Leff Siegel Awards for Excellence in Pancreatic Cancer Research, named for his late wife, will ensure that we will continue to make progress against this disease. All of us at Columbia offer our condolences to the extended Siegel family. John A. Chabot, M.D., Executive Director of the Pancreas Center and Chief, Division of GI/Endocrine Surgery, Columbia University Medical Center 1/3
